title: BRIEF-Medpace Holdings Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.39
text: Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Medpace Holdings Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.39 Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Medpace Holdings Inc: * MEDPACE HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.93 * BACKLOG AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 GREW 8.4% TO $524.4 MILLION FROM $483.9 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016 * BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS AUTHORIZED NEW SHARE REPURCHASES OF UP TO $50 MILLION OF COMPANYâ€˜S COMMON STOCK * COMPANY FORECASTS 2018 NET SERVICE REVENUE IN RANGE OF $412 MILLION TO $428 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.21 TO $1.33 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $112.7 MILLION VERSUS $108.2 MILLION * QTRLY NET SERVICE REVENUE $99.4 MILLION VERSUS $95.4 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38, REVENUE VIEW $97.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.80, REVENUE VIEW $416.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
